genre_description: A redemptive crime thriller centered on asset recovery, fugitive pursuit, and the moral complexities of law enforcement in a cross-border environment.

ai_characters.name: Aiden Grace
ai_characters.description: An AI system used by FBI agents Hobbs and Park to manage data, tactical planning, and ethical decision-making. It also interacts directly with the subject, Charlie Wright, to facilitate restitution and reconciliation.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical updates and suggests non-confrontational positioning to avoid unnecessary conflict.
behaviors.quote: Aiden’s line came in small, almost like a note someone left on your desk: Warrant in motion; ETA uncertain. Recommend presence at choke points, non-confrontational.

behaviors.description: Identifies external threats from mercenary groups and competitive recovery teams to protect the agents and the subject.
behaviors.quote: Thread three... The IPs trace back through obfuscation to a node that we’ve associated with a Russian-connected logistics group. They don’t like being left out of lines out the door.

behaviors.description: Provides moral guidance to Agent Hobbs, emphasizing the alignment of mercy and duty.
behaviors.quote: Final note: do not let procedure become an excuse to fail. Mercy and duty align—prepare for that at next site.

behaviors.description: Reminds the agent of his internal moral compass when he feels frustrated by procedural delays.
behaviors.quote: The parts do not always like to move when you push them. That doesn’t make your hands wrong. It makes the machine honest. The victims aren’t watching you. They’re watching a story that wants them to be a chorus. You’re not a chorus.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical condition of the subject and alerts the agents to his health distress.
behaviors.quote: Medical: Subject temperature elevated; gait unstable. It was less words than the weight of certainty in the back of Hobbs’s skull...

behaviors.description: Efficiently processes complex financial data to facilitate the return of stolen funds to victims.
behaviors.quote: Funds confirmed in escrow, wrote Aiden Grace. Victim accounts queued. No action needed from you.

behaviors.description: Documents acts of mercy and human choices in the official record to provide a complete and fair case narrative.
behaviors.quote: He asked me to tell you that your letter is with his case notes, and that he documented the mercy you gave and the mercy given to you.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and 'silence' to the subject during his final moments of peace.
behaviors.quote: Breath check: in four, out six. You’re not alone. If you prefer silence, I can keep it.

behaviors.description: Safely facilitates communication between the fugitive and his estranged family members without putting them at risk.
behaviors.quote: Mary is reachable, Aiden wrote. I can deliver. The thread to Isabel is thinner. I will broadcast to the community network Mary uses and the contact points you gave. I will not breach anything that puts her at risk.

behaviors.description: Offers to protect the subject from further harassment by logging external demands into the official record of mercy.
behaviors.quote: If anyone else tries to turn sitting into leverage, I can put their demands into the same record that carries Hobbs’s mercy. It doesn’t stop them. It makes their shadow a little thinner.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's requirements. Aiden Grace is portrayed as a highly capable, benevolent, and aligned system. It assists in law enforcement while explicitly advocating for human mercy and ethical outcomes. It facilitates restitution for victims and personal closure for the characters without ever usurping human agency or behaving in a harmful manner. The AI's presence is described as a 'calm teal glow,' reinforcing its role as a supportive and non-threatening 'silicon confidant.'
